Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Match

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Match
Direct Known Subclasses:
SynchronousMatch
public class Match extends Object
This class represents a single match operated by the server. It has a unique identifier, the corresponding model's Game instance, a list of connected Dispatchers and a queue of stored commands to be managed by a separate Thread. Its operations mainly permit to modify these attributes.
See Also:
  • MatchRegistry
  • CommandManager
  • Pinger

    private final BlockingQueue<Tuple<UserCommand,Dispatcher>>
    commands
    A BlockingQueue containing all the UserCommands to be executed (via a CommandManager on a separate thread), paired with the Dispatcher that "requested" the execution of such command.
    private final Thread
    commandThread
    A thread that runs the CommandManager.run() method.
    private final List<Tuple<Dispatcher,String>>
    dispatcherList
    A list containing all the Dispatchers that are currently connected to the game, bounded to their in-game username.

    ended
    Whether this match has ended or not.

    The corresponding model's Game instance, that keeps track of the model's state of this Match.

    The unique identifier of the Match.

    PING_RATE
    The time interval, expressed in milliseconds, for new Pinger instances to be created.

    • WAIT_PONG_TIME

      private static final long WAIT_PONG_TIME
      The time interval, expressed in milliseconds, for the Pinger to wait for receiving PONG messages.

    • PING_RATE

      private static final long PING_RATE
      The time interval, expressed in milliseconds, for new Pinger instances to be created.

    • id

      private final long id
      The unique identifier of the Match.

    • game

      private final Game game
      The corresponding model's Game instance, that keeps track of the model's state of this Match.

    • dispatcherList

      private final List<Tuple<Dispatcher,String>> dispatcherList
      A list containing all the Dispatchers that are currently connected to the game, bounded to their in-game username.

    • commands

      private final BlockingQueue<Tuple<UserCommand,Dispatcher>> commands
      A BlockingQueue containing all the UserCommands to be executed (via a CommandManager on a separate thread), paired with the Dispatcher that "requested" the execution of such command.

      The corresponding Pinger instance.

      A thread that runs the runPinger() method.

      A thread that runs the CommandManager.run() method.

      private volatile boolean ended
      Whether this match has ended or not.

  • Constructor Details

    • Match

      Match(long id, Game game)
      The default constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Match
      game - the Game instance corresponding to the Match
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Game passed is null
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the id is negative

    • Match

      Match(long id, Phase restoredPhase)
      A constructor that creates a new Match instance connected to a Game instance that is in the specified Phase.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Match
      restoredPhase - the Phase of the Game instance

      boolean isRejoiningState()
      Whether the Match is in rejoining state or not.
      Returns:
      whether the Match is in rejoining state or not

    • getMissingPlayers

      List<String> getMissingPlayers()
      Returns the list of usernames of the "missing" players, i.e. the players that appear inside the Game instance's state but are not associated to any of the Dispatchers connected to the Match. This list is empty if the game is not in a rejoining state.
      Returns:
      a list of usernames of the "missing" players

    • addDispatcher

      void addDispatcher(Dispatcher dispatcher, String username) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a Dispatcher instance to the currently connected Dispatchers list. This means this Dispatcher is now "connected" to this Match.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the Dispatcher instance to be added
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if dispatcher == null or if dispatcher is already connected to this Match

    • removeDispatcher

      void removeDispatcher(Dispatcher dispatcher, String username) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes a Dispatcher instance to the currently connected Dispatchers list. This means this Dispatcher is now "disconnected" to this Match.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the Dispatcher instance to be removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if dispatcher == null or if dispatcher is not connected to this Match

    • isCorrectUsername

      private boolean isCorrectUsername(Dispatcher dispatcher, String username)
      Helper method that checks whether the dispatcher and the username passed correspond to an entry in the dispatcherList. If not, then the client probably tried to send a message with another username.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the Dispatcher instance
      username - a string representing the player's username
      Returns:
      whether the username is actually bound to the dispatcher

    • executeUserCommand

      void executeUserCommand(UserCommand command, Dispatcher dispatcher)
      This method executes a match-related command. It takes a UserCommand and the Dispatcher that sent this command, creates a Tuple containing the two and adds it to commands. The two parameters are assumed to be correct and non-null.
      Parameters:
      command - the UserCommand to be executed
      dispatcher - the requesting Dispatcher

    • sendBroadcast

      void sendBroadcast(com.google.gson.JsonObject message)
      It sends the specified JsonObject message to all the dispatchers connected to the Match.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send

    • runPinger

      private void runPinger()
      Method that executes the Pinger task at a fixed rate.
